data.actual_result: You have to reopen the server, switch channels in the server or wait for other new message to see it.
data.expected_result: Unread marker for the server and a badge for the Discord icon for the unread messages should instantly be shown.
data.short_description: Unread marker doesn't appear instantly after unmuting a server
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any muted (or mute any) server with new unread messages - Right click the server icon and untick "Mute Server" - Change the server and observe the server icon for the server with unread messages
